document_data.mainbody:
Sirak Mazelor was a drow merchant of Menzoberranzan working for House Baenre and their representative in Mantol-Derith in the late 15 century DR.
Sirak liked luxurious items made by the drow. She was a sophisticated individual.
During the turmoil between the duergar and deep gnomes instigated by the demon lord Fraz-Urbluu circa 1486 DR, Sirak was ready to fully conquer the trading post, but only if the Zhentarim accepted the change in government.
